import React,{useState} from 'react'; import Title from '../components/Title/Title'; import photoprofile from '../assets/images/ghofranebenhmaid.jpg'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion" const [mouse, setMouse] = useState([0,0,false]); const [mx, my, isActive] = mouse; const About = () => { return (
about me
{/* */} { const { offsetTop, offsetLeft } = e.currentTarget; setMouse([e.pageX - offsetLeft, e.pageY - offsetTop, true]); }} onMouseEnter={() => setMouse([mx, my, true])} onMouseLeave={() => setMouse([mx, my, false])} className='text--mb--m'> {isActive && ( )} <strong> I am a Front-end Developer from Tunisia, living in Copenhagen Danmark.I have studied IT & Multimedia in Tunisia and have gained a lot of practical experience in Photography, Graphic Design, and Web Design. </strong>
<small> This experience I have gained through different jobs working for a political candidate’s campaign and later doing media work for them as member of the Tunisian parliament. I have also worked for a Tunisian magazine creating graphics and page layout. </small>
Desing

Technologies

); }; export default About;
